website_summaries.verdict: Two monitor stands for the price of one. Can be used for dual monitor setups or to support other devices on the desk.
pros: Each stand is well-made and assembled

cons: No built-in organization or containers for loose objects on the desk

website_summaries.verdict: Anyone looking for extreme flexibility in dual monitor stands with little assembly and a low price point will be thrilled with this no-frills solution.
pros: Construction is sturdy, and the non-skid feet prevent monitors from sliding around on desk and scratching the surface

cons: Maximum height of each stand is 4 inches, which isn't high enough for some users
Footprint may be a bit large for smaller desks
